translation: And I see ill omens, O Kesava. I do not see any good in slaying my kinsmen in battle.
commentary: 1.31 occasions omens? f and? I see I see? Opposites adverse? Keshav Or Kesava? Not not? f and? Shreya: good? I don't see (I) see? killing killing? Swajanam our peope? Ahave in battle.Commentary Kesava means he who has fine or luxuriant hair.
